meaningMnemonic: You have two <radical>bow</radical>s but they're both covered in <radical>ice</radical>. This has made them very <kanji>weak</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You give up on your trip and bring the <kanji>weak</kanji> bows back to your car, but it's stuck in the ice and snow. You decide to use the bows as a <reading>jack</reading> (じゃく) to try to get your car unstuck. Unfortunately, they're just too weak and they break in half.
